person.persName: Hite B. Henry (Louisville, Kentucky, auctioneer and merchant. )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, auctioneer and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel G. Henry and Mary Henry. Married to Ella Smith Henry in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 5, 1863. Father of Mary L. Henry, and Ellen F. Henry. Attended school in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Clerk for the S. G. Henry & Company auction house in Louisville from 1858 to 1860. Household hired three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Auctioneer and commission merchant in partnership with Samuel G. Henry in S.G. Henry & Company in Louisville from 1861 through 1865.
